ksentence: ಅಲ್ಲಿ ನೋಡು, ಮರದ ಪಕ್ಕದಲ್ಲಿ‌ ಕರಡಿ ನಿಂತಿದೆ.

kesentence: see over there, there's a bear standing beside the tree.

esentence: Alli nodu, maradha mele pakshi kulithide.
kesentence: see over there, there's a bird sitting on the tree.
